subject: Avalanches
Mountain Climbing
lead_paragraph: In late September, Benedikt Böhm became the fastest man to climb and ski Mount Manaslu, roughly a month after an avalanche on its slopes killed 11 people.
snippet: In late September, Benedikt Böhm became the fastest man to climb and ski Mount Manaslu, roughly a month after an avalanche on its slopes killed 11 people.
